query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
1 Forse semilia miglia di lontano 2 ci ferve l’ora sesta, e questo mondo 3 china già l’ombra quasi al letto piano,
4 quando ’l mezzo del cielo, a noi profondo, 5 comincia a farsi tal, ch’alcuna stella 6 perde il parere infino a questo fondo;
7 e come vien la chiarissima ancella 8 del sol più oltre, così ’l ciel si chiude 9 di vista in vista infino a la più bella.
query.result:
**English:**
1 Perhaps a thousand miles away 2 the sixth hour boils for us, and this world 3 already bends its shadow almost to the flat bed,
4 when the middle of the sky, deep for us, 5 begins to become such that some stars 6 lose their appearance down to this depth;
7 and as the very bright handmaid 8 of the sun comes further, so the sky closes 9 from sight to sight up to the most beautiful one.
**Malay:**
1 Mungkin seribu batu jauhnya 2 jam keenam mendidih untuk kita, dan dunia ini 3 sudah membengkokkan bayangannya hampir ke dasar yang datar,
4 ketika tengah langit, yang dalam bagi kita, 5 mulai menjadi sedemikian rupa sehingga beberapa bintang 6 kehilangan penampakannya hingga ke kedalaman ini;
7 dan ketika pelayan yang sangat terang 8 dari matahari datang lebih jauh, maka langit tertutup 9 dari pandangan ke pandangan hingga yang paling indah.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
10 Non altrimenti il trïunfo che lude 11 sempre dintorno al punto che mi vinse, 12 parendo inchiuso da quel ch’elli ’nchiude,
13 a poco a poco al mio veder si stinse: 14 per che tornar con li occhi a Bëatrice 15 nulla vedere e amor mi costrinse.
query.result:
**English:**
10 Not otherwise the triumph that plays 11 always around the point that conquered me, 12 seeming enclosed by that which it encloses,
13 little by little faded from my sight: 14 so that love and nothing to see compelled me 15 to turn my eyes back to Beatrice.
**Malay:**
10 Tidak seperti itu kemenangan yang bermain-main 11 selalu di sekitar titik yang menaklukanku, 12 tampak tertutup oleh apa yang dikandungnya,
13 sedikit demi sedikit menghilang dari pandanganku: 14 sehingga cinta dan tidak ada yang bisa dilihat memaksaku 15 untuk mengalihkan pandanganku kembali ke Beatrice.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
16 Se quanto infino a qui di lei si dice 17 fosse conchiuso tutto in una loda, 18 poca sarebbe a fornir questa vice.
query.result:
**English:**
16 If all that has been said of her up to now 17 were to be concluded in one song of praise, 18 it would be little to express this virtue.
**Malay:**
16 Jika semua yang telah dikatakan tentangnya hingga kini 17 disimpulkan semuanya dalam satu pujian, 18 itu akan sedikit untuk mengungkapkan kebajikan ini.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
19 La bellezza ch’io vidi si trasmoda 20 non pur di là da noi, ma certo io credo 21 che solo il suo fattor tutta la goda.
query.result:
**English:**
19 The beauty that I saw transcends 20 not only us, but I believe for sure 21 that only its maker enjoys it fully.
**Malay:**
19 Kecantikan yang kulihat melampaui 20 bukan hanya kita, tetapi aku percaya pasti 21 bahwa hanya penciptanya yang menikmatinya sepenuhnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
22 Da questo passo vinto mi concedo 23 più che già mai da punto di suo tema 24 soprato fosse comico o tragedo:
25 ché, come sole in viso che più trema, 26 così lo rimembrar del dolce riso 27 la mente mia da me medesmo scema.
query.result:
**English:**
22 From this step, defeated, I surrender 23 more than ever before to the point of his theme, 24 whether it was comic or tragic:
25 for, like the sun that trembles most in the face, 26 so the remembrance of the sweet smile 27 deprives my mind of myself.
**Malay:**
22 Dari langkah ini, kalah, aku menyerah 23 lebih dari sebelumnya pada inti temanya, 24 apakah itu komedi atau tragedi:
25 karena, seperti matahari yang paling gemetar di wajah, 26 demikianlah kenangan akan senyuman manis itu 27 mencabut pikiranku dari diriku sendiri.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
34 Cotal qual io lascio a maggior bando 35 che quel de la mia tuba, che deduce 36 l’ardüa sua matera terminando,
37 con atto e voce di spedito duce 38 ricominciò: «Noi siamo usciti fore 39 del maggior corpo al ciel ch’è pura luce:
40 luce intellettüal, piena d’amore; 41 amor di vero ben, pien di letizia; 42 letizia che trascende ogne dolzore.
query.result:
**English:**
34 Such as I leave to greater trump 35 than that of my trumpet, which is bringing 36 its arduous theme to a close,
37 with the action and voice of a ready leader 38 he began again: "We have emerged 39 from the greatest body to the heaven that is pure light:
40 intellectual light, full of love; 41 love of the true good, full of joy; 42 joy that transcends every sweetness.
**Malay:**
34 Seperti yang kutinggalkan untuk seruan yang lebih besar 35 daripada seruan terompetku, yang menyimpulkan 36 tema sulitnya yang berakhir,
37 dengan tindakan dan suara seorang pemimpin yang siap 38 ia mulai lagi: "Kita telah keluar 39 dari tubuh terbesar ke surga yang merupakan cahaya murni:
40 cahaya intelektual, penuh cinta; 41 cinta kebaikan sejati, penuh kegembiraan; 42 kegembiraan yang melampaui setiap kemanisan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
43 Qui vederai l’una e l’altra milizia 44 di paradiso, e l’una in quelli aspetti 45 che tu vedrai a l’ultima giustizia».
query.result:
**English:**
43 Here you will see the one and the other host 44 of paradise, and the one in those aspects 45 that you will see at the final judgment.
**Malay:**
43 Di sini kamu akan melihat pasukan yang satu dan yang lainnya 44 dari surga, dan yang satu dalam aspek-aspek itu 45 yang akan kamu lihat pada penghakiman terakhir.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
46 Come sùbito lampo che discetti 47 li spiriti visivi, sì che priva 48 da l’atto l’occhio di più forti obietti,
49 così mi circunfulse luce viva, 50 e lasciommi fasciato di tal velo 51 del suo fulgor, che nulla m’appariva.
query.result:
**English:**
46 Like a sudden flash of lightning that dispels 47 the visible spirits, so that the eye is deprived 48 of stronger objects by the act,
49 so a living light surrounded me, 50 and left me wrapped in such a veil 51 of its radiance that nothing appeared to me.
**Malay:**
46 Seperti kilat tiba-tiba yang menghalau 47 roh-roh yang kelihatan, sehingga mata kehilangan 48 objek-objek yang lebih kuat oleh tindakan itu,
49 begitulah cahaya terang mengelilingiku, 50 dan membiarkanku terbungkus dalam tabir 51 cahaya cemerlangnya, sehingga tidak ada yang tampak bagiku.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
52 «Sempre l’amor che queta questo cielo 53 accoglie in sé con sì fatta salute, 54 per far disposto a sua fiamma il candelo».
query.result:
**English:**
52 Love, which always calms this heaven, 53 welcomes into itself with such salutation, 54 to make the candle ready for its flame.
**Malay:**
52 Cinta, yang selalu menenangkan langit ini, 53 menyambut ke dalam dirinya dengan penghormatan seperti itu, 54 untuk membuat lilin siap untuk apinya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
76 Anche soggiunse: «Il fiume e li topazi 77 ch’entrano ed escono e ’l rider de l’erbe 78 son di lor vero umbriferi prefazi.
query.result:
**English:**
76 He also added: "The river and the topazes 77 that enter and leave and the laughter of the grasses 78 are true foreshadowings of them.
**Malay:**
76 Dia juga menambahkan: "Sungai dan batu topas 77 yang masuk dan keluar dan tawa rerumputan 78 adalah bayangan sejati mereka.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
79 Non che da sé sian queste cose acerbe; 80 ma è difetto da la parte tua, 81 che non hai viste ancor tanto superbe».
query.result:
**English:**
79 Not that these things are bitter in themselves; 80 but the fault is on your part, 81 that you have not yet seen things so sublime.
**Malay:**
79 Bukan berarti bahwa hal-hal ini pahit dengan sendirinya; 80 tetapi kesalahannya ada pada dirimu, 81 bahwa kamu belum pernah melihat hal-hal yang begitu agung.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
82 Non è fantin che sì sùbito rua 83 col volto verso il latte, se si svegli 84 molto tardato da l’usanza sua,
85 come fec’ io, per far migliori spegli 86 ancor de li occhi, chinandomi a l’onda 87 che si deriva perché vi s’immegli;
88 e sì come di lei bevve la gronda 89 de le palpebre mie, così mi parve 90 di sua lunghezza divenuta tonda.
query.result:
**English:**
82 No infant who is so suddenly weaned 83 with his face toward the milk, if he wakes up 84 much later than his usual time,
85 acts as I did, in order to make better mirrors 86 still of my eyes, by bending down to the water 87 that flows down so that it may improve itself;
88 and just as the eaves of my eyelids drank from it, 89 so it seemed to me that its length had become round.
**Malay:**
82 Tiada bayi yang begitu tiba-tiba disapih 83 dengan wajahnya menghadap susu, jika ia terbangun 84 jauh lebih lambat dari waktu biasanya,
85 bertindak seperti yang kulakukan, untuk membuat cermin yang lebih baik 86 mataku, dengan menundukkan diri ke air 87 yang mengalir turun sehingga dapat memperbaiki dirinya sendiri;
88 dan sama seperti atap kelopak mataku meminumnya, 89 maka tampaklah bagiku bahwa panjangnya telah menjadi bulat.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
91 Poi, come gente stata sotto larve, 92 che pare altro che prima, se si sveste 93 la sembianza non süa in che disparve,
94 così mi si cambiaro in maggior feste 95 li fiori e le faville, sì ch’io vidi 96 ambo le corti del ciel manifeste.
query.result:
**English:**
91 Then, like people who have been under masks, 92 who seem different from before, if they remove 93 the appearance in which they disappeared,
94 so the flowers and the sparks changed for me into greater joy, 95 so that I saw 96 both courts of heaven revealed.
**Malay:**
91 Kemudian, seperti orang-orang yang telah berada di bawah topeng, 92 yang tampak berbeda dari sebelumnya, jika mereka melepaskan 93 penampilan yang membuat mereka menghilang,
94 demikianlah bunga-bunga dan percikan api berubah menjadi kegembiraan yang lebih besar bagiku, 95 sehingga aku melihat 96 kedua istana surga terwujud.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
97 O isplendor di Dio, per cu’ io vidi 98 l’alto trïunfo del regno verace, 99 dammi virtù a dir com’ ïo il vidi!
100 Lume è là sù che visibile face 101 lo creatore a quella creatura 102 che solo in lui vedere ha la sua pace.
query.result:
**English:**
97 O splendor of God, through which I saw 98 the high triumph of the true kingdom, 99 give me the power to tell how I saw it!
100 There is a light up there that makes visible 101 the creator to that creature 102 who finds peace only in seeing him.
**Malay:**
97 Wahai cahaya Tuhan, yang melaluinya kulihat 98 kemenangan agung kerajaan yang sejati, 99 berikanlah aku kekuatan untuk menceritakan bagaimana kulihatnya!
100 Ada cahaya di atas sana yang membuat terlihat 101 sang pencipta bagi makhluk 102 yang hanya menemukan kedamaian dalam melihatnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
103 E’ si distende in circular figura, 104 in tanto che la sua circunferenza 105 sarebbe al sol troppo larga cintura.
query.result:
**English:**
103 And it extends in a circular shape, 104 so that its circumference 105 would be too wide a belt for the sun.
**Malay:**
103 Dan ia membentang dalam bentuk lingkaran, 104 sedemikian rupa sehingga kelilingnya 105 akan menjadi sabuk yang terlalu lebar untuk matahari.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
106 Fassi di raggio tutta sua parvenza 107 reflesso al sommo del mobile primo, 108 che prende quindi vivere e potenza.
query.result:
**English:**
106 Its appearance is made of rays of light 107 reflected from the top of the first moving heaven, 108 which then takes on life and power.
**Malay:**
106 Wujudnya terbuat dari sinar cahaya 107 yang dipantulkan dari puncak langit bergerak pertama, 108 yang kemudian mengambil kehidupan dan kekuatan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
109 E come clivo in acqua di suo imo 110 si specchia, quasi per vedersi addorno, 111 quando è nel verde e ne’ fioretti opimo,
112 sì, soprastando al lume intorno intorno, 113 vidi specchiarsi in più di mille soglie 114 quanto di noi là sù fatto ha ritorno.
query.result:
**English:**
109 And as a cliff in the water at its base 110 mirrors itself, as if to see itself adorned, 111 when it is rich in greenery and flowers,
112 so, standing above the light all around, 113 I saw mirrored in more than a thousand thresholds 114 all that of us has returned up there.
**Malay:**
109 Dan seperti tebing di air di dasarnya 110 memantulkan dirinya, seolah-olah untuk melihat dirinya sendiri yang dihiasi, 111 ketika kaya dengan tanaman hijau dan bunga,
112 begitu, berdiri di atas cahaya di sekeliling, 113 kulihat terpantul di lebih dari seribu ambang pintu 114 semua yang dari kita telah kembali ke atas sana.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
115 E se l’infimo grado in sé raccoglie 116 sì grande lume, quanta è la larghezza 117 di questa rosa ne l’estreme foglie!
118 La vista mia ne l’ampio e ne l’altezza 119 non si smarriva, ma tutto prendeva 120 il quanto e ’l quale di quella allegrezza.
query.result:
**English:**
115 And if the lowest grade gathers in itself 116 such great light, how vast is the breadth 117 of this rose in its outermost petals!
118 My sight was not lost in the expanse and height, 119 but took in all the quantity and quality 120 of that joy.
**Malay:**
115 Dan jika tingkat terendah mengumpulkan di dalamnya 116 cahaya yang begitu besar, betapa luasnya 117 bunga mawar ini di kelopak terluarnya!
118 Pandanganku tidak hilang dalam keluasan dan ketinggian, 119 tetapi mengambil semua kuantitas dan kualitas 120 dari kegembiraan itu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
121 Presso e lontano, lì, né pon né leva: 122 ché dove Dio sanza mezzo governa, 123 la legge natural nulla rileva.
query.result:
**English:**
121 Near and far, there, neither sets nor rises: 122 for where God governs without intermediary, 123 natural law is of no avail.
**Malay:**
121 Dekat dan jauh, di sana, tidak ada terbenam atau terbit: 122 karena di mana Tuhan memerintah tanpa perantara, 123 hukum alam tidak berlaku.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
124 Nel giallo de la rosa sempiterna, 125 che si digrada e dilata e redole 126 odor di lode al sol che sempre verna,
127 qual è colui che tace e dicer vole, 128 mi trasse Bëatrice, e disse: «Mira 129 quanto è ’l convento de le bianche stole!
130 Vedi nostra città quant’ ella gira; 131 vedi li nostri scanni sì ripieni, 132 che poca gente più ci si disira.
query.result:
**English:**
124 In the yellow of the sempiternal rose, 125 which fades and dilates and gives forth 126 an odor of praise to the sun that always blooms,
127 like one who is silent and yet wishes to speak, 128 Beatrice drew me and said: "Look 129 how great is the assembly of the white robes!
130 See how our city revolves; 131 see our seats so filled 132 that few more are desired among us.
**Malay:**
124 Di dalam warna kuning mawar abadi, 125 yang memudar dan melebar dan mengeluarkan 126 bau pujian kepada matahari yang selalu mekar,
127 seperti orang yang diam namun ingin berbicara, 128 Beatrice menarikku dan berkata: "Lihatlah 129 betapa besarnya perkumpulan jubah putih!
130 Lihatlah kota kita betapa ia berputar; 131 lihatlah tempat duduk kita yang begitu penuh 132 sehingga hanya sedikit orang lagi yang diinginkan di antara kita.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
133 E ’n quel gran seggio a che tu li occhi tieni 134 per la corona che già v’è sù posta, 135 prima che tu a queste nozze ceni,
136 sederà l’alma, che fia giù agosta, 137 de l’alto Arrigo, ch’a drizzare Italia 138 verrà in prima ch’ella sia disposta.
query.result:
**English:**
133 And in that great seat to which you keep your eyes fixed 134 because of the crown that is already placed there, 135 before you dine at these nuptials,
136 the soul will sit, which will be exalted below, 137 of the lofty Henry, who to set Italy straight 138 will come before she is ready.
**Malay:**
133 Dan di singgahsana agung yang kepadanya kau arahkan pandanganmu 134 karena mahkota yang telah diletakkan di sana, 135 sebelum kau menyantap hidangan perkawinan ini,
136 jiwa itu akan duduk, yang akan diagungkan di bawah, 137 dari Henry yang agung, yang untuk meluruskan Italia 138 akan datang sebelum ia siap.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
139 La cieca cupidigia che v’ammalia 140 simili fatti v’ha al fantolino 141 che muor per fame e caccia via la balia.
query.result:
**English:**
139 The blind greed that bewitches you 140 has made you similar to the little child 141 who dies of hunger and pushes away the nurse.
**Malay:**
139 Ketamakan buta yang menyihirmu 140 telah menjadikanmu serupa dengan anak kecil 141 yang mati kelaparan dan mengusir pengasuhnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
142 E fia prefetto nel foro divino 143 allora tal, che palese e coverto 144 non anderà con lui per un cammino.
query.result:
**English:**
142 And he will be so perfect in the divine forum 143 then, that the open and the hidden 144 will not go with him along the same path.
**Malay:**
142 Dan dia akan begitu sempurna di forum ilahi 143 saat itu, sehingga yang nyata dan yang tersembunyi 144 tidak akan pergi bersamanya di sepanjang jalan yang sama.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
145 Ma poco poi sarà da Dio sofferto 146 nel santo officio; ch’el sarà detruso 147 là dove Simon mago è per suo merto,
148 e farà quel d’Alagna intrar più giuso».
query.result:
**English:**
145 But soon he will be punished by God 146 in the holy office; he will be cast down 147 to where Simon Magus is for his deserts,
148 and he will make the one from Alagna enter even lower.
**Malay:**
145 Tetapi tidak lama kemudian dia akan dihukum oleh Tuhan 146 dalam jabatan suci; dia akan dicampakkan 147 ke tempat Simon Magus berada karena perbuatannya,
148 dan dia akan membuat orang dari Alagna masuk lebih rendah lagi.
